Name: Heritage Financial Group Inc
Description: DELISTED - Heritage Financial Group, Inc., formerly Heritage Financial Group, serves as the bank holding company for HeritageBank of the South (the Bank). The principal business of the Bank consists of attracting retail and commercial deposits from the general public and investing those funds primarily in permanent loans secured by first mortgages on owner-occupied, one- to four-family residences, multi-family residences and commercial property and a variety of consumer and commercial business loans. The Bank offers a variety of deposit accounts having a range of interest rates and terms, which include savings accounts, money market deposit and term certificate accounts, and checking accounts. On December 4, 2009, the Company acquired The Tattnall Bank (Tattnall). On December 31, 2009, it acquired certain assets of the Lake City, Florida, branch of Atlantic Coast Bank.
